SELECT lm.id as id, wx.wx_name as view_wxname, lm.fun_name, lm.message_q, lm.message_a, lm.message_q_time, lm.message_a_time FROM chat_log_message_fun lm INNER JOIN chat_wxuser wx on lm.wxuser_id =wx.id WHERE lm.is_deleted =0 and wx.is_deleted =0
and lm.fun_name =#{params.fun_name}
and wx.wx_name like concat('%', #{params.view_wxname}, '%')
order by lm.id+0 desc

SELECT lm.id as id, wx.wx_name as view_wxname, lm.more_name, lm.message_q, lm.message_a, lm.message_q_time, lm.message_a_time FROM chat_shiniu_log_message lm INNER JOIN chat_wxuser wx on lm.wxuser_id =wx.id WHERE lm.is_deleted =0 and wx.is_deleted =0
and lm.more_name =#{params.more_name}
and wx.wx_name like concat('%', #{params.view_wxname}, '%')
order by lm.id+0 desc
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(message_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeStr, count(1) as cou FROM chat_log_message where is_deleted =0 and message_type='q' group by timeStr
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeStr, count(1) as cou FROM chat_wxuser where is_deleted =0 group by timeStr
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(message_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeStr, count(distinct wxuser_id) as cou FROM chat_log_message where is_deleted =0 and message_type='q' group by timeStr
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(share_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeStr, count(id) as cou FROM chat_log_share where is_deleted =0 group by timeStr
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeStr, count(id) as cou FROM chat_log_sign where is_deleted =0 group by timeStr
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeStr, count(id) as cou FROM chat_log_file_download where is_deleted =0 group by timeStr

SELECT ls.id as id, wuser.wx_name AS wx_name, ls.share_time FROM chat_wxuser wuser inner join chat_log_share ls ON wuser.id = ls.wxuser_id WHERE wuser.is_deleted =0
and wuser.wx_name like concat('%', #{params.wx_name}, '%')
and SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{params.message_time}, ',', 1) <= DATE_FORMAT(ls.share_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{params.message_time}, ',', -1) >= DATE_FORMAT(ls.share_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by ls.id+0 desc

SELECT log.id, log.order_code, log.order_amount, log.create_time as order_time, log.fy_level, wxuser.wx_name as fy_wxname, wxuser.phone as fy_phone, log.fy_rate, log.fy_amount FROM chat_commission_log log INNER JOIN chat_wxuser wxuser on log.fy_wxuserid =wxuser.id where log.is_deleted =0 and wxuser.is_deleted =0
and log.order_code = #{params.order_code}
and log.order_code = #{params.fy_level}
and wxuser.wx_name like concat('%', #{params.fy_wxname}, '%')
and wxuser.phone like concat('%', #{params.fy_phone}, '%')
and SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{params.order_time}, ',', 1) <= DATE_FORMAT(log.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{params.order_time}, ',', -1) >= DATE_FORMAT(log.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by log.id+0 desc

SELECT wx.phone as view_phone, gor.* FROM chat_goods_order gor INNER JOIN chat_wxuser wx on gor.wxuser_id = wx.id where gor.is_deleted = 0 AND wx.is_deleted =0
and gor.wxuser_name like concat('%', #{params.wxuser_name}, '%')
and wx.phone like concat('%', #{params.phone}, '%')
and gor.goods_title like concat('%', #{params.goods_title}, '%')
and gor.order_code like concat('%', #{params.order_code}, '%')
and gor.pay_type = #{params.pay_type}
and gor.pay_status = #{params.pay_status}
order by gor.id+0 desc

SELECT lm.id as id, wx.wx_name as view_wxname, lm.fun_name, lm.message_q, lm.message_a, lm.message_q_time, lm.message_a_time FROM chat_shiniu_log_message_fun lm INNER JOIN chat_wxuser wx on lm.wxuser_id =wx.id WHERE lm.is_deleted =0 and wx.is_deleted =0
and lm.fun_name =#{params.fun_name}
and wx.wx_name like concat('%', #{params.view_wxname}, '%')
order by lm.id+0 desc

SELECT id, wxuser_name, image_title, use_point, use_gas, view_cou, star as star_cou, open_flag, image_url1, image_url2, image_url3, image_url4, create_time as send_time FROM chat_image_info where is_deleted=0
and wxuser_name like concat('%', #{params.wxuser_name}, '%')
and image_title like concat('%', #{params.image_title}, '%')
order by id+0 desc

SELECT id, wxuser_name, image_title, use_point, image_url1, image_url2, image_url3, image_url4, create_time as send_time FROM chat_image_info where is_deleted=0 and open_flag=1
and id =#{params.id}
and wxuser_name like concat('%', #{params.wxuser_name}, '%')
and image_title like concat('%', #{params.image_title}, '%')
order by id+0 asc
